mapper.select: select r.no, r.title, r.content, r.hit, r.reg_date regDate, r.user_no userNo, r.name userName from (select rownum rn, o.no, o.title, o.content, o.hit, o.reg_date, o.user_no, o.name from (select b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date, b.user_no, u.name from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by no desc)o )r where r.rn > #{startRnum} and r.rn <=#{endRnum}
select b.no, b.title, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') regDate, b.user_no userNo, u.name userName from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by no desc

select b.no, b.title, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') regDate, b.user_no userNo, u.name userName from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no
and title like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into board values ( seq_board_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{userNo} )
mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') regDate, b.user_no userNo, u.name userName, b.content from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and b.no = #{no};
